name: Blast For Money
description:
LOUD MUSIC WARNING:

Lower your volume :D

Disclaimer:

Due to exporting issues its recommended that you download the downloadable version

If you encounter any visual issues please do one thefollowing

  1. Switch your browser
  2. refresh the page
  3. download the downloadable version of the game!
Story:

You play as an unnamed Protagonist that fell into a huge debt and he owes really big people a lot of money , so he thought of sensible solution , and that to blast through the territory  of a heavily armed gang to steal their wealth in order to pay off his debt!

You go on a small but dangerous journey venturing deeper and deeper into the gang's territory revealing more challenges as you go!

Controls:

W - Go Upwards                               

S - Go Downwards

A - Go Left

D - Go Right

LMB - Shoot

Shift - Use your slow motion ability

R - refill your slow motion ability                                                          


Credits:
  • Music by : DavidKBD(https://davidkbd.itch.io)
  • Tileset by: Tilation(https://tilation.itch.io)
  • Developed entirely by: BeamDev
